image.author: alvin's_brother
image.post: Maybe it’s just because “Alvin” don’t want anyone to focus on who wrote his comment but on the content of his comment…
image.title: Remember the Valencia Consensus Parenthetical

image.author: alvin's_brother
image.post: Can we agree on Mr. X instead?
image.title: Remember the Valencia Consensus Parenthetical

image.author: alvin's_brother
image.post: Here’s a correction for point #29:You should read this instead: “The image is not saturated: No point in the image is overexposed, so that it would cause a FUZZ in the image.”
image.title: Remember the Valencia Consensus Parenthetical

image.author: alvin's_brother
image.post: Can people try to forget about who wrote a comment and concentrate on the content of the comment instead?  Getting tired of this kind of focus.
image.title: Remember the Valencia Consensus Parenthetical

image.author: alvin's_brother
image.post: Here’s the justification: It’s simply because I’m sick and tired of people always focussing on my name (most often in negative terms) instead of what I say, which is the only thing that matter…
image.title: Remember the Valencia Consensus Parenthetical
